Dead by Daylight - это многопользовательская игра в жанре ужасов в режиме (4 против 1), где один игрок берет на себя роль жестого Убийцы, а четыре других игрока являются Выжившими, пытающимися сбежать от убийцы. ПИЗДОБОЛЬСТВО. многопользовательская хуйня, которая еще и с ебучим Маэрсом ебаным пиздец. если вы читаете эту хуиту то не читайте
goodplay

Very origional/entertaining/scary.  Gets blood pumping/hands sweating.  Bugs have not been anywhere near gamebreaking for me, but it seems like mileage may vary.  My biggest gripe is that the in-game community can be ridiculously  salty/unhelpful which sucks but that's a lot of games these days.

IMO, it's worth full price.  There is enough to chew on for the 20$ price tag, decide if you want the extra killers after you buy the game, the ones that are provided are great and I'd say half of them are totally newb friendly.  More than enough to keep you occupied for a while.  The way this game makes me feel wakes me up and gets me hyper afterwards.  That fact alone makes it worth!!

Its a fun game with bugs but you can deal with it

Being in a 1 vs 4 situation is very tough consdiering you can be caught very quickly if not too careful. Dead by Daylight has taken a different strat in its play style and has done very well. I have enjoyed the game most times when I play. The environment and sound effects suit the scene very well but bugs seem to be a constant issue though. When playing as a survivor I tend to find myself stuck with a killer that likes to camp and then I can never seem to win which gets very annoying at times. When DLC killers are realeased I am not sure if they are tested to well as they tend to be released extremley OP and ruins the fun until balance tweaks are made.(LeatherFace) The game play itself is very good but does need tweaks like most games with their bugs. When the game was first released it was very popular and was ok to get a decent lobby and now it is very hard to lobby in a decent time frame particuarlly if you are playing with friends

In all the game is good but does need adjusting I would give it a 7.5/10.

This game should be called Lobby Simulator 2017. I've spent SO much time in lobbies waiting for a connection. Dead by Daylight is very unique and is a lot of fun when it works but it is simply too buggy and unreliable to purchase at this point in time.

跟风买的要慎重。
就算是为了联网，也不怎么样。一人秒匹，当鬼秒匹，组队到死都匹不到。不知道是怎么做的匹配系统。这样的匹配迟早把耐心消耗光。
要是真的喜欢这种类型的游戏，还不如等等年内发售的精心打磨的十三号星期五。

By far in my top 5 survival horror games that iv played over the yrs!! But what makes this one stand out more than most is how during gameplay as a survivor, this game makes you honestly panic and your mind race! When im playing and running from the phsycho killer and hes hot on my tail and gaining i feel like im honestly in danger especially because i only play this awesome game with good headphones in the dark and of course like every horror survival gamer should do with the volume at max so you get that good ol' fear inducing ambiance.  I highly refer that you buy this game if you like short to intense thrill and heart pounding killer escaping segments, or hide and die games like i love to call em haha

Incredibly fun and I've never played one of the team vs. 1 type of game, it will have you screaming constantly as the survivor, and as the killer you will love catching your prey. The customization trees for the killers and survivors is great, tons of options to help you play just the way you want. One problem with the game is that it can be difficult to find a match if you party up with people (que times as solo is almost instant whereas with a group of 3 or 4 you might be waiting over 5 minutes). Another problem is the fact that it seems the skillchecks for performing tasks don't always register, but it seems like it has gotten much better. Besides those two flaws I would give this game an 8/10 and highly recommend it if you wish to have some scares and some fun with your friends because nothing is better than teaming up to escape. Also hearing your friend scream in terror over chat running from the killer also makes this hilarious to play.

Very good game.

It's definitely tense while playing and you hear the heartbeat start pumping.

You would think at a glance that the game might get old quickly and doesn't have replayable value once you know the layout of the maps.

However, that's what makes this a gem. The map and generator spawn points are procedurally generated which makes it impossible to know where what is on the map other than a few key features i.e. a main building in the map.

The only drawback for this games is it's loading spead and probably the net code.

It's slightly difficult to join a game as a survivor as there's no dedicated servers. You connect to the Killer's lobby so the connection quality depends just as much on them as it does you.

When you've joined a game and the match is starting, it does also take a little while for it to load the map. However, this could be excused due to the fact that it's at this point it's generating what the map will look like and where to spawn the generators.

Overall, a really good game and would definitely recommend.
I would recommend this game as it is very enjoyable. Easy to learn how to play.

Um breve resumo...                                                                                                                                                                  bom, o jogo possui alguns bugs, em termos de gráficos, o jogo merece respeito apesar de não ser nada comparado a certos jogos de franquias bem mais famosas, mas mesmo assim é bem aceitável. Os servidores, pelo menos para mim, as vezes encontro dificuldades em buscar partidas com sobrevivente, mas isso vem melhorando de uns tempos pra cá, e espero que continue melhorando.                                                                                                                                                                                   Recomendo comprarem o jogo, com amigos é bem mais divertido, mas jogando solo tambem é divertido. Acredito que a ideia é inovadora e é um jogo que vale a pena jogar.
nota: 9/10.

I have almost 600 hours in this game, and as of now I am telling everyone I know not to buy this game. Do NOT support this pathetic excuse for a company.

1) They do NOT care about their fan base at all. Toxicity and harassment run rampent and every three matches, someone is going to say something rude or nasty in end game chat. The developers have removed, REMOVED, their report system outside of the game recently, and when sent an email about severe harassment and threats, they replied saying to use their in-game report system, which is woefully incomplete and does nothing to actually report anything. 

2) Toxicity on both sides is vicious, with killers actively seeking out specific survivors over and over again to farm and slug, while survivors harass and sandbag killers into just giving up. It's to the point that a tunneled survivor (constantly chased, downed, and hooked no matter how many other survivors try to intervene) will disconnect and lose rank rather than deal with it. Killers that are constantly flash light stunned by toxic survive with friends groups will stop altogether and disconnect, costing everyone the match rather than put up with the harassment (not that I blame them.)

3)The devs focus more on putting out content rather than fixing in-game bugs. The audio is still jacked up on several maps,  killers and survivors alike get stuck in small places and there are several spots where a survivor can stand and not get hit by the killer (exploits.) This is even worse for console players who can't even play some matches the bugs are so bad, and aren't given access to any content on the pre-specified release date. Console players are almost completely ignored in official forums as well when reporting problems. On top of all of this, instead of fixing these bugs and several others, the devs are now focusing on nerfing several perks for survivors and buffing several for killers.

4) Bringing us to perks. There are several perks that are outright broken. Starting with perks, they are nerfing speed perks for survivors, while killers continue to speed up as the chase continues. This means that rather then having a reliable perk to escape the killer with, they are nerfing it while leaving the killer with an already overly inflated advantage. Now, don't get me wrong, a fantastic player can keep a killer busy long enough for their speed perk (there are only three) to kick back in. But killers, as the chase goes on with the same survivor, will steadily pick up speed to catch that survivor. They are also nerfing a skill that allows a survivor, if they can hit a very tiny skill check, instantly escape from the killers grasp. They can only do it once, yes once, a match. The devs have decided it is too over powered and are nerfing it so that it only temporarily stuns the killer rather than granting a survivor immediate escape.

5) Gameplay overall is fun, and the concept is one of a kind, but there is very little variation from match to match, and the new map is a literal reskin of an already existing one. The tournament with a $5,000 cash prize was a sh**show with poorly hired and casted ESport commentators, very minimal and lacking rules that changed TWICE during the actual tournament, and groups from across the globe paired against one another for laggy, glitchy matches that couldn't be watched, much less judged. 

6) Finally, the devs themselves. They are unprofessional, and I have nothing good to say about most of them. The game director himself can take no constructive critisicm what-so-ever, and when asked whether or not he was going to have his devs fix a simple game mechanic that was literally gamebreaking, he told people on a live stream to go play Civ V if they were going to complain. He has thrown similar tantrums on two other live streams, being completely unprofessional and nasty to genuinely curious and outright rude and trolly viewers alike. 

If you've gotten this far, good for you. Do not waste your money on this sh**show of a game. Free is too costly for the wreck this has become. I especially don't reccomend it for people with anxiety or depression because the toxicity is only going to make it worse. I have been told on two seperate occasions to "go die of cancer/aids." Reported both of those people and have seen them multiple times since.  

It is worth no ones time or money.

Играл с ОБТ, видел таких багов, о которых не знал сам Сатана! Щас пофиксили все, реже стал заходить. Расскажу как я получил 1 ранг:Такой заходишь на сервер, Маньяк Афк! Фармим 20К и уходим! Следующий матч: Захожу опять на сервер, все вылетели из-за бага, я с маньяком 1 на 1, он дает фармится, получаем 20К и уходим. Затем захожу на сервер, маньяк дает нам фармится(Затем методом тыка убивает 2их), получаем 20К и уходим и тд:D

[h1]Крик души[/h1]

Иди на хер, Dead by Daylight! Просто иди на хер! Я закрываю глаза на твои проблемы и играю в тебя не без удовольствия. И вот так ты это ценишь? Большим средним пальцем?! Пускай в каждой второй игре попадается мудак, который ловит тебя, вешает на крюк и смотрит как ты умираешь, недавая даже малейшего шанса на спасение. Пускай подключение к лобби иногда идёт дольше, чем сам матч. Пускай рейтинг за выжевшего набить куда сложнее, чем за убийцу. Пускай ты ничего с этим не делаешь. Всё это фигня! Но то, что случилось сегодня это, сука, просто #&@$#.

                                                                           [h1]Кулл Стори Тайм[/h1]

Матч был сложный, убийца медсестра бдила в оба глаза. Каждый из выживших побывал на крюке, но к счастью мои товарищи не оказались полными мудозвонами и помогали друг другу. И вот, казалось бы, всё: генераторы заведены, ворота открыты, игроки все целы и уже убежали. Настала моя очередь делать ноги. "Хмм, пойду поищу люк", - подумал я. Посмотрел там, посмотрел здесь... нету его нигде. "Ну, ок. Нет так нет. Пойду к воротам", - подумал я опять. Что же могло произойти? А произошло то, что игра послала меня на всеми известное место [spoiler]да, на х*й[/spoiler], КРАШНУВШИСЬ В ШАГЕ ОТ ВЫХОДА!!! Это было так подло с твоей стороны, Dead by Daylight, так подло. Получай за это гневный отзыв в карму! 

                                                                  [h1]Эпилог[/h1]

Если вы вдруг не поняли, читая этот отзыв, поясняю, что игра мне нравится и я всё-равно буду в неё играть [strike]какое-то время[/strike]. Но, чтобы загладить свою вину, разработчикам придётся добавить что-нибудь получше, чем новые костюмы и Билла Овербека из Left 4 Dead.

Достаточно воды утекло с моего обзора на эту игру.
За прошедшее время с ее выхода могу сказать одно - игра не столь плоха, как я говорил о ней. За те года, добавили много контента. К сожалению, контент этот не столь разнообразит игру. Да, новые фишечки, новые персонажи, варианты убийства, способности, перки, карты и так далее, но геймплей остается все одним и тем же. Подобных игр, как эта не так много или успеха не возымели, в отличии от сего чуда. Проиграв в нее очень много времени, я увидел и испытал достаточно. Хочу сказать, что необходимое мне разнообразие геймплея, которое могли добавить, попросту не хватает. Игре уже хрен знает сколько лет пробыла на рынке, и меня удивляет, что игроки не убавляются. Коммьюнити становится только больше. Добавили ранги, игроков оценивают по скиллу. Игра пошла не по той степи, по которой она начинала, а превратилась в компетитив. Она была раньше действительно криповой. С другой стороны, я понимаю, что к хоррору привыкаешь и уже становится не страшно, но я любил ее больше, когда она была страшной, боюсь это время утекло...

a very interesting game. Yes,at the moment (14.03.17) the game is not very optimized and there are a couple of funny bugs,for example is when you fall from the shoulders of the hunter and get into the wall, and hunter can't catch you alone from the whole team-but this game has a lot of advantages:
1)it is unique-I had not seen anything like that.
2)it is well-designed the characters (survivors and hunters) with unique abilities.
3)enough interesting perks that adds to the game a lot of variations of development.
4)good enough DLS-allowing you to fully enjoy this game.

내가  이 게임을 산 걸 후회 한다. 무슨 생존자가  살인마 희롱하고 뺑뺑이 돌면 잡을 수가 있어야지 내가 진짜 빡칠라고 이 게임을 삿나 아니 할꺼면 생존자한테 스테미너 걸든가 좀 뛰면 느려지게 여캐는 개 빨라서 살인마랑 동급으로 뛰어 무슨 좀 생존자 업뎃만 신경 쓰지말고 살인마 상향에 힘 좀써라 이렇게 가다간 살인마 할 사람 아무도 안나와서 결국 파국으로 간다.
Игра та нормально, но фпс не радует

Dead by daylight is an interesting game with a unique playstyle. I have invested a couple of hours into this game so far and have enjoyed my experience both as a survivor and as a killer. However that said, If you are looking to play this game with your friends then expect to be waiting awhile, whilst the solo match making queue seems to work flawlessly, queuing with friends does not and can really ruin the experience if you want to play with friends.
Finding MatchMaking with friend take us too long time, sometimes we cannot even find a match for whole day! Please Solve this problem as soon as possible! Thank you!
